message: Race condition in review spawning: Multiple reviews created for same phase (auto-review-36966bf1a07c and auto-review-c14bfe443960). This defeats the purpose of the SQLite migration to fix race conditions. Root cause likely in submit_phase_for_review or _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers without proper locking/uniqueness constraints.

SQLite schema incomplete: submit_review_verdict fails with 'no such column: final_verdict'. The reviews table schema is missing required columns. SQLite migration is incomplete - cannot actually submit verdicts.
